Metrics/CyclomaticComplexity.description:
Description

A complexity metric that is strongly correlated to the number of test cases needed to validate a method.
Metrics/CyclomaticComplexity.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

AllowedMethods: [] (type: list)
AllowedPatterns: [] (type: list)
Max: 7 (type: int)
